articles.title: SpiceJet aircraft caught in Kalbaishakhi while landing, 40 injured as bags rain on flyers - India Today
articles.description: At least 40 passengers were injured after cabin luggage fell on flyers as a SpiceJet plane got caught up in a storm. Most of the passengers sustained head injuries.
